name: Donkey kong remake (Les donkey kings)
description:
Like in the original play as JumpMan and go save Lady from the bad guy Donkey kong ! Climb buildings while jumping on top of barrels to get to her and make sure to not fall down ! 

This game is a 3d remake of the Donkey Kong game of 1981 made by first year students of E-artsup.

Games made by other students of our class :

https://team-q-te.itch.io/q-bert-the-remake

https://lucas-dailly.itch.io/arkanoid-remak

https://tedderkopp.itch.io/space-invaders-remake

https://dkor.itch.io/frogger-the-bounty-hunter
